subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Justin Verlander gave Detroit exactly what it needed, becoming baseball’s first 17-game winner as the division-leading Tigers beat the host Indians to avoid being swept and open a three-game lead in the A.L. Central.
snippet: Justin Verlander gave Detroit exactly what it needed, becoming baseball’s first 17-game winner as the division-leading Tigers beat the host Indians to avoid being swept and open a three-game lead in the A.L. Central.
